did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

bioghist.p: Old Zion German Lutheran Church in Philadelphia. Founded in 1742. (Think it may have become St. Michael's Zion Lutheran Church - HSP has a good deal of microfilm and hard copy records)

scopecontent.p: The collection contains oversize photocopies of church records of marriages, baptisms, and burials from 1793-1927 (with some gaps for different kinds of records). These may be from microfilm held at the Lutheran Theological Seminary.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
